nodes.text: Galidraan was a planet located in the Galidraan system within the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with Galidraan III and Galidraan IV, all of which were located in the same system.

Galidraan first appeared in the canon novel Tarkin, written by James Luceno and released on November 4, 2014. Galidraan originated in the Star Wars Legends comic book series Jango Fett: Open Seasons, written by Haden Blackman, which ran from May to September in 2002.
